plot outline: Makrandh has lost huge amount of land on his research of making a part where in cars could accumulate less petrol.His father Suryabhan is upset with him over this.He has a quality time with his family with wife Sumati and children Sayali and Kisna.Also living with them is Dhanjai his brother in law whose suffering from disorder of robbing things around.Sayali has to go Mumbai for a dance performance Dhanjaji robs a tempo from a friend and they start the journey.But on mid way Suryabhan suffers a heart attack and is admitted to hospital.Makrandh tells everyone that they should go to Mumbai as his father will be upset if they don't reach Mumbai for the big day .Morever more troubles take place on their journey and the village cops are also behind them to arrest Dhanaji for robbing the tempo.
title: De Dhakka
plot: A family traveling from Kolhapur to Mumbai will face many ups and down before they reach their destination.

Makrandh has lost huge amount of land on his research of making a part where in cars could accumulate less petrol.His father Suryabhan is upset with him over this.He has a quality time with his family with wife Sumati and children Sayali and Kisna.Also living with them is Dhanjai his brother in law whose suffering from disorder of robbing things around.Sayali has to go Mumbai for a dance performance Dhanjaji robs a tempo from a friend and they start the journey.But on mid way Suryabhan suffers a heart attack and is admitted to hospital.Makrandh tells everyone that they should go to Mumbai as his father will be upset if they don't reach Mumbai for the big day .Morever more troubles take place on their journey and the village cops are also behind them to arrest Dhanaji for robbing the tempo.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
